ntpSnmpMIB.name: ntpSnmpMIB

revisions.description: This revision of the MIB module is published as RFC 5907.

ntpSnmpMIB.description: The Management Information Base for NTP time entities. Copyright (c) 2010 IETF Trust and the persons identified as authors of the code. All rights reserved. Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification, is permitted pursuant to, and subject to the license terms contained in, the Simplified BSD License set forth in Section 4.c of the IETF Trust's Legal Provisions Relating to IETF Documents (http://trustee.ietf.org/license-info).

NtpStratum.name: NtpStratum
NtpStratum.description: The NTP stratum, with 16 representing no stratum.

NtpDateTime.name: NtpDateTime
NtpDateTime.description: NTP date/time on the device, in 128-bit NTP date format. If time is not syncronized, this field shall be a zero-length string. This trusted certificate (TC) is not to be used for objects that are used to set the time of the node querying this object. NTP should be used for this -- or at least SNTP.

ntpEntSoftwareName.name: ntpEntSoftwareName
ntpEntSoftwareName.description: The product name of the running NTP version, e.g., 'ntpd'.

ntpEntSoftwareVersion.name: ntpEntSoftwareVersion
ntpEntSoftwareVersion.description: The software version of the installed NTP implementation as a full version string, e.g., 'ntpd-4.2.0b@1.1433 ...'

ntpEntSoftwareVendor.name: ntpEntSoftwareVendor
ntpEntSoftwareVendor.description: The vendor/author of the installed NTP version.

ntpEntSystemType.name: ntpEntSystemType
ntpEntSystemType.description: General hardware/os platform information, e.g., 'Linux 2.6.12 / x86'.

ntpEntTimeResolution.name: ntpEntTimeResolution
ntpEntTimeResolution.description: The time resolution in integer format, where the resolution is represented as divisions of a second, e.g., a value of 1000 translates to 1.0 ms.

ntpEntTimePrecision.name: ntpEntTimePrecision
ntpEntTimePrecision.description: The entity's precision in integer format, shows the precision. A value of -5 would mean 2^-5 = 31.25 ms.

ntpEntTimeDistance.name: ntpEntTimeDistance
ntpEntTimeDistance.description: The distance from this NTP entity to the root time reference (stratum 0) source including the unit, e.g., '13.243 ms'.

ntpEntStatusCurrentMode.name: ntpEntStatusCurrentMode
ntpEntStatusCurrentMode.description: The current mode of the NTP. The definition of each possible value is: notRunning(1) - NTP is not running. notSynchronized(2) - NTP is not synchronized to any time source (stratum = 16). noneConfigured(3) - NTP is not synchronized and does not have a reference configured (stratum = 16). syncToLocal(4) - NTP is distributing time based on its local clock (degraded accuracy and/or reliability). syncToRefclock(5) - NTP is synchronized to a local hardware refclock (e.g., GPS). syncToRemoteServer(6) - NTP is synchronized to a remote NTP server ('upstream' server). unknown(99) - The state of NTP is unknown.

ntpEntStatusStratum.name: ntpEntStatusStratum
ntpEntStatusStratum.description: The NTP entity's own stratum value. Should be a stratum of syspeer + 1 (or 16 if no syspeer).

ntpEntStatusActiveRefSourceId.name: ntpEntStatusActiveRefSourceId
ntpEntStatusActiveRefSourceId.description: The association ID of the current syspeer.

ntpEntStatusActiveRefSourceName.name: ntpEntStatusActiveRefSourceName
ntpEntStatusActiveRefSourceName.description: The hostname/descriptive name of the current reference source selected as syspeer, e.g., 'ntp1.ptb.de' or 'GPS' or 'DCFi', ...

ntpEntStatusActiveOffset.name: ntpEntStatusActiveOffset
ntpEntStatusActiveOffset.description: The time offset to the current selected reference time source as a string including unit, e.g., '0.032 ms' or '1.232 s'.

ntpEntStatusNumberOfRefSources.name: ntpEntStatusNumberOfRefSources
ntpEntStatusNumberOfRefSources.description: The number of reference sources configured for NTP.

ntpEntStatusDispersion.name: ntpEntStatusDispersion
ntpEntStatusDispersion.description: The root dispersion of the running NTP entity, e.g., '6.927'.

ntpEntStatusEntityUptime.name: ntpEntStatusEntityUptime
ntpEntStatusEntityUptime.description: The uptime of the NTP entity, (i.e., the time since ntpd was (re-)initialized not sysUptime!). The time is represented in hundreds of seconds since Jan 1, 1970 (00:00:00.000) UTC.

ntpEntStatusDateTime.name: ntpEntStatusDateTime
ntpEntStatusDateTime.description: The current NTP date/time on the device, in 128-bit NTP date format. If time is not syncronized, this field shall be a zero-length string. This object can be used to timestamp events on this node and allow a management station to correlate different time objects. For example, a management station could query this object and sysUpTime in the same operation to be able to relate sysUpTime to NTP time. This object is not to be used to set the time of the node querying this object. NTP should be used for this -- or at least SNTP.

ntpEntStatusLeapSecond.name: ntpEntStatusLeapSecond
ntpEntStatusLeapSecond.description: Date the next known leap second will occur. If there is no leap second announced, then this object should be 0.

ntpEntStatusLeapSecDirection.name: ntpEntStatusLeapSecDirection
ntpEntStatusLeapSecDirection.description: Direction of next known leap second. If there is no leap second announced, then this object should be 0.

ntpEntStatusInPkts.name: ntpEntStatusInPkts
ntpEntStatusInPkts.description: The total number of NTP messages delivered to the NTP entity from the transport service. Discountinuities in the value of this counter can occur upon cold start or reinitialization of the NTP entity, the management system and at other times as indicated by discontinuities in the value of sysUpTime.

ntpEntStatusOutPkts.name: ntpEntStatusOutPkts
ntpEntStatusOutPkts.description: The total number of NTP messages delivered to the transport service by this NTP entity. Discountinuities in the value of this counter can occur upon cold start or reinitialization of the NTP entity, the management system and at other times as indicated by discontinuities in the value of sysUpTime.

ntpEntStatusBadVersion.name: ntpEntStatusBadVersion
ntpEntStatusBadVersion.description: The total number of NTP messages that were delivered to this NTP entity and were for an unsupported NTP version. Discountinuities in the value of this counter can occur upon cold start or reinitialization of the NTP entity, the management system and at other times as indicated by discontinuities in the value of sysUpTime.

ntpEntStatusProtocolError.name: ntpEntStatusProtocolError
ntpEntStatusProtocolError.description: The total number of NTP messages that were delivered to this NTP entity and this entity was not able to process due to an NTP protocol error. Discountinuities in the value of this counter can occur upon cold start or reinitialization of the NTP entity, the management system and at other times as indicated by discontinuities in the value of sysUpTime.

ntpEntStatusNotifications.name: ntpEntStatusNotifications
ntpEntStatusNotifications.description: The total number of SNMP notifications that this NTP entity has generated. Discountinuities in the value of this counter can occur upon cold start or reinitialization of the NTP entity, the management system and at other times as indicated by discontinuities in the value of sysUpTime.

ntpEntStatPktModeTable.name: ntpEntStatPktModeTable
ntpEntStatPktModeTable.description: The number of packets sent and received by packet mode. One entry per packet mode.

ntpEntStatPktModeEntry.name: ntpEntStatPktModeEntry
ntpEntStatPktModeEntry.description: A statistical record of the number of packets sent and received for each packet mode.

ntpEntStatPktSent.name: ntpEntStatPktSent
ntpEntStatPktSent.description: The number of NTP packets sent with this packet mode. Discountinuities in the value of this counter can occur upon cold start or reinitialization of the NTP entity, the management system and at other times as indicated by discontinuities in the value of sysUpTime.

ntpEntStatPktReceived.name: ntpEntStatPktReceived
ntpEntStatPktReceived.description: The number of NTP packets received with this packet mode. Discountinuities in the value of this counter can occur upon cold start or reinitialization of the NTP entity, the management system and at other times as indicated by discontinuities in the value of sysUpTime.

ntpAssociationTable.name: ntpAssociationTable
ntpAssociationTable.description: The table of currently mobilized associations.

ntpAssociationEntry.name: ntpAssociationEntry
ntpAssociationEntry.description: The table entry of currently mobilized associations.

ntpAssocId.name: ntpAssocId
ntpAssocId.description: The association ID. This is an internal, unique ID.

ntpAssocName.name: ntpAssocName
ntpAssocName.description: The hostname or other descriptive name for the association.

ntpAssocRefId.name: ntpAssocRefId
ntpAssocRefId.description: The refclock driver ID, if available.

ntpAssocAddressType.name: ntpAssocAddressType
ntpAssocAddressType.description: The type of address of the association. Can be either IPv4 or IPv6 (both with or without zone index) and contains the type of address for unicast, multicast, and broadcast associations.

ntpAssocAddress.name: ntpAssocAddress
ntpAssocAddress.description: The IP address (IPv4 or IPv6, with or without zone index) of the association. The type and size depends on the ntpAssocAddressType object. Represents the IP address of a uni/multi/broadcast association.

ntpAssocOffset.name: ntpAssocOffset
ntpAssocOffset.description: The time offset to the association as a string.

ntpAssocStatusJitter.name: ntpAssocStatusJitter
ntpAssocStatusJitter.description: The jitter in milliseconds as a string.

ntpAssocStatusDelay.name: ntpAssocStatusDelay
ntpAssocStatusDelay.description: The network delay in milliseconds as a string.

ntpAssocStatusDispersion.name: ntpAssocStatusDispersion
ntpAssocStatusDispersion.description: The root dispersion of the association.

ntpAssociationStatisticsTable.name: ntpAssociationStatisticsTable
ntpAssociationStatisticsTable.description: The table of statistics for current associations.

ntpAssociationStatisticsEntry.name: ntpAssociationStatisticsEntry
ntpAssociationStatisticsEntry.description: The table entry of statistics for current associations.

ntpAssocStatInPkts.name: ntpAssocStatInPkts
ntpAssocStatInPkts.description: The total number of NTP messages delivered to the NTP entity from this association. Discountinuities in the value of this counter can occur upon cold start or reinitialization of the NTP entity, the management system and at other times as indicated by discontinuities in the value of sysUpTime.

ntpAssocStatOutPkts.name: ntpAssocStatOutPkts
ntpAssocStatOutPkts.description: The total number of NTP messages delivered to the transport service by this NTP entity for this association. Discountinuities in the value of this counter can occur upon cold start or reinitialization of the NTP entity, the management system and at other times as indicated by discontinuities in the value of sysUpTime.

ntpAssocStatProtocolError.name: ntpAssocStatProtocolError
ntpAssocStatProtocolError.description: The total number of NTP messages that were delivered to this NTP entity from this association and this entity was not able to process due to an NTP protocol error. Discountinuities in the value of this counter can occur upon cold start or reinitialization of the NTP entity, the management system and at other times as indicated by discontinuities in the value of sysUpTime.

ntpEntHeartbeatInterval.name: ntpEntHeartbeatInterval
ntpEntHeartbeatInterval.description: The interval at which the ntpEntNotifHeartbeat notification should be sent, in seconds. If set to 0 and the entNotifHeartbeat bit in ntpEntNotifBits is 1, then ntpEntNotifHeartbeat is sent once. This value is stored persistently and will be restored to its last set value upon cold start or restart.

ntpEntNotifBits.name: ntpEntNotifBits
ntpEntNotifBits.description: A bit for each notification. A 1 for a particular bit enables that particular notification, a 0 disables it. This value is stored persistently and will be restored to its last set value upon cold start or restart.

ntpEntNotifMessage.name: ntpEntNotifMessage
ntpEntNotifMessage.description: Used as a payload object for all notifications. Holds a cleartext event message.

ntpEntNotifModeChange.name: ntpEntNotifModeChange
ntpEntNotifModeChange.description: The notification to be sent when the NTP entity changes mode, including starting and stopping (if possible).

ntpEntNotifStratumChange.name: ntpEntNotifStratumChange
ntpEntNotifStratumChange.description: The notification to be sent when stratum level of NTP changes.

ntpEntNotifSyspeerChanged.name: ntpEntNotifSyspeerChanged
ntpEntNotifSyspeerChanged.description: The notification to be sent when a (new) syspeer has been selected.

ntpEntNotifAddAssociation.name: ntpEntNotifAddAssociation
ntpEntNotifAddAssociation.description: The notification to be sent when a new association is mobilized.

ntpEntNotifRemoveAssociation.name: ntpEntNotifRemoveAssociation
ntpEntNotifRemoveAssociation.description: The notification to be sent when an association is demobilized.

ntpEntNotifConfigChanged.name: ntpEntNotifConfigChanged
ntpEntNotifConfigChanged.description: The notification to be sent when the NTP configuration has changed, e.g., when the system connected to the Internet and was assigned a new IP address by the ISPs DHCP server.

ntpEntNotifLeapSecondAnnounced.name: ntpEntNotifLeapSecondAnnounced
ntpEntNotifLeapSecondAnnounced.description: The notification to be sent when a leap second has been announced.

ntpEntNotifHeartbeat.name: ntpEntNotifHeartbeat
ntpEntNotifHeartbeat.description: The notification to be sent periodically (as defined by ntpEntHeartbeatInterval) to indicate that the NTP entity is still alive.

ntpEntNTPCompliance.name: ntpEntNTPCompliance
ntpEntNTPCompliance.description: The compliance statement for SNMP entities that use NTP and implement the NTP MIB.

ntpEntSNTPCompliance.name: ntpEntSNTPCompliance
ntpEntSNTPCompliance.description: The compliance statement for SNMP entities that use SNTP and implement the NTP MIB.

ntpEntObjectsGroup1.name: ntpEntObjectsGroup1
ntpEntObjectsGroup1.description: A collection of objects for the NTP MIB.

ntpEntObjectsGroup2.name: ntpEntObjectsGroup2
ntpEntObjectsGroup2.description: A collection of objects for the NTP MIB.

ntpEntNotifGroup.name: ntpEntNotifGroup
ntpEntNotifGroup.description: A collection of notifications for the NTP MIB
